project.description: In the past, semedico-core was the primary Semedico backend project and was the dependency for the semedico-frontend project. With the introduction of document modules ("docmods") however, a new dependency structure was necessary. The document module classes need access to the core classes. But this means that the core cannot depend on document modules by itself which would be necessary to import the document module Tapestry module classes into the SemedicoCoreModule. This project basically exists to have a Tapestry module class that can import the document modules without introducing dependency circles.
